hotspots.marketing_summary: The 2015 Coupe's sporty design and sleek exterior are designed to turn heads wherever you go.
Experience a new level of connectivity with the 7-inch Display Audio, offering intuitive touchscreen control.
Parking and backing up made easier with the standard rearview camera.
The EX-L trim features 17-inch alloy wheels, adding to the Civic's sporty and premium appeal.

hotspots.feature_title: Paddle Shifters (EX, EX-L Coupe with CVT)
hotspots.marketing_summary: Enhance your driving experience with sports car-inspired paddle shifters for more fun.
Unlock and enter your Civic effortlessly, without ever taking your keys out of your pocket.
See more of your surroundings with Honda LaneWatch, providing an expanded view of the passenger side.
